summary: This is an email from court reporter Paula Speer transmitting the public portion of a transcript from a hearing in the US v. Maxwell case on November 10, 2021. It references a sealed portion to be sent separately and indicates the judge granted permission for email handling of sealed materials.

persons.name: Paula Speer
persons.context: She is the sender of the email transmitting the public portion of the court transcript for the Maxwell hearing.

events.title: Hearing in US v. Maxwell
events.description: A court hearing was held in the case US v. Maxwell, 20-cr-330, with a transcript produced.

keyFacts: A hearing occurred on November 10, 2021, in the criminal case US v. Maxwell (20-cr-330).
The public portion of the hearing transcript was attached to an email from court reporter Paula Speer.
A sealed portion of the transcript existed and was to be sent separately via email, with the judge's permission for this handling method.
